Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene

Provides models of objects that can be rendered in the visual scene.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ICurve Defines a Bezier curve in the framework.
IMesh Defines a polygonal mesh object that represents a 3D object segmented from microscopy data.
INeuronMorphology Describes the morphology of the cell, independent of different ways of visualizing it.
IScene Defines the totality of the objects that can be viewed in the 3D world
ISceneObject Defines an object that can be viewed in the scene.
ISegment Defines the smallest unit of an INeuronMorphology.
ISegmentGroup Defines a group of segments in a neuron morphology.
ISelectable A general interface for any object that can be selected by a user.
ISlide A Panel in 3D space that displays an image of a brain slice.
ISurface Defines a Bezier Surface.
IVolume Defines a volume of space, identified by the boundaries of a box or a sphere.
 

Class Summary
CurveImpl An implementation of ICurve
MeshImpl Defines an implementation of IMesh.
NeuronMorphologyImpl  
SceneImpl  
SceneObjectImpl  
SceneObjectManager Keeps lists of all scene objects.
SchematicSceneObject Base class for a type of object that will be rendered procedurally using geometry instancing tricks.
SegmentGroupImpl Implements an ISegmentGroup.
SegmentImpl Implementation of ISegment.
SlideImpl Implementation of ISlide.
SurfaceImpl Implementation of ISurface.
VolumeImpl Implementation of IVolume.
 

Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene Description

Provides models of objects that can be rendered in the visual scene.
